data.title: Salaries for Members of Congress, Supreme Court Justices, and the President
meta_keywords: impactful research and analysis showing Americans how taxes
and regulations affect them. With our unique combination of policy expertise
we strive to be the number one federal and state source for sound fiscal policymaking.
data.meta_description: National taxpayer organization provides crucial, impactful research and analysis showing Americans how taxes, government spending, and regulations affect them. With our unique combination of policy expertise, outreach know-how, and true non-partisanship, we strive to be the number one federal and state source for sound fiscal policymaking.
data.text:
* Notwithstanding the Vice President salary of $284,600 for 2024 listed by the Office of Personnel Management, the amount payable to the Vice President has been frozen since 2019.

* The payable salary of the Vice President has been subject to a pay freeze since 2014 but was increased this year by an act of Congress. The official 2019 Vice President salary in the Executive Schedule ($246,900) is higher than the payable amount. This amount is annually adjusted as a ceiling on the salary of certain federal employees. A pending FY 2019 appropriations may allow for a requested increase in salaries for Supreme Court Justices.
